episodes.title: Getting To Know Gerrit Lösch - Part 2 - Higher Education and OCD (JW.org)
episodes.description:
http://jwsurvey.org/cedars-blog/the-governing-body-of-jehovahs-witnesses-explained

In part 2 of this series, we get to know Governing Body member Gerrit Lösch a little better by hearing his views on higher education. Gerrit Lösch explains how Jehovah's Witnesses are to view the pursuit of bettering oneself through higher education as a form of disorder, comparable with Obsessive Compulsive Disorder (OCD).

For more information on Gerrit Lösch and other members of the Governing Body of Jehovah's Witnesses, please click on the link above.

episodes.title: Getting To Know Anthony Morris III - Part 11 - The Thinkingest People On The Planet (JW.org)
episodes.description:
http://jwsurvey.org/cedars-blog/the-governing-body-of-jehovahs-witnesses-explained

In part 11 of our intriguing series of videos, we get to know Anthony Morris the Third a little better by hearing his views on "independent thinking". Anthony, a member of the Governing Body of Jehovah's Witnesses, explains why JWs are "the thinkingest people on the planet", and tells of how Witnesses are not "chained" to their religion despite the threat of shunning for any who disagree with the Watch Tower Society.

For more information on Anthony and the Governing Body of Jehovah's Witnesses, please click on the link above.

The BBC documentary from which the interview clips are taken can be viewed on the following link: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ST8iRJf783w

episodes.title: Getting To Know Anthony Morris III - Part 9 - Anthony reminds us to donate (JW.org)
episodes.description:
http://jwsurvey.org/cedars-blog/the-governing-body-of-jehovahs-witnesses-explained

In Part 9 of our revealing series of videos, Governing Body member Anthony Morris III reminds us what a privilege it is to donate towards the Worldwide Work of Jehovah's Witnesses, and that doing so will make us happy. He also relates a conversation with his wealthy father, who asked questions about how donated money is spent.

episodes.title: Getting To Know Anthony Morris III - Part 6 - Anthony's warning about the media (JW.org)
episodes.description:
http://jwsurvey.org/cedars-blog/if-satan-controls-the-media-how-is-watchtower-able-to-use-it-so-effectively

In Part 6 of our revealing series of videos, Governing Body member Anthony Morris III issues a stern warning about the media. He urges Jehovah's Witnesses to reject any negative reports about the organization, reminding them that the media is under Satan's control. Curiously, even though the media is under Satanic influence, the Coordinators' Committee of the Governing Body is able to use it to portray the beliefs of Jehovah's Witnesses in a favorable light. As a result, we see many favorable news reports and media items, including an awards ceremony appearance by Prince in which he used the Satanically-influenced media to give praise to Jehovah.

episodes.title: Getting To Know Anthony Morris III - Part 10 - Higher Education (no music)
